snippet: State officials expect to appeal a ruling by Michael Shipp of District Court in Newark upholding a 21-year-old prohibition.
abstract: Judge Michael Shipp of United States District Court in Newark upholds 21-year-old law prohibiting sports betting in all but four states; ruling deals setback to New Jersey's attempts to revive its struggling casino industry by grabbing a piece of what has become a multibillion-dollar industry.
lead_paragraph: State officials expect to appeal a ruling by Michael Shipp of District Court in Newark upholding a 21-year-old prohibition.

headline.seo: Judge Rejects Efforts to Allow Sports Betting in New Jersey
headline.main: Judge Rejects Effort to Allow Sports Betting in New Jersey
headline.print_headline: Judge Rejects Effort to Allow Sports Betting in New Jersey
